text:
4th October 2017: Sam Smith and Brandon Flynn are spotted smooching in the street, and it's glorious. The pair are snapped walking arm-in-arm through New York’s West Village, before Sam, 25, leans in for a kiss with 24-year-old Brandon.

This is the first we've heard that Sam and 13 Reasons Why's Brandon are a couple, as only the month before, Sam had spoken about being "insanely single."

24th October 2017: 'Stay With Me' singer Sam confirms his relationship with Brandon!

He was chatting to The Ellen Degeneres Show when host Ellen playfully grilled the star by asking: "You're not single right now anymore, right?"

Sam replied: "No, I'm not, which is crazy. "

He continued: "It's weird bringing out an album and not being single. Because when I brought out In the Lonely Hour I was so lonely. But now I'm singing songs about another guy.

"I'm quite happy, so it's quite weird."



9th November 2017: Sam reveals that he definitely sees children in his future. So we obviously get carried away and assume he means with Brandon...

He told The Sun: "I want kids so bad. I just feel it's nature's way of reminding you that it's not about you. It makes you not selfish."

21st December 2017: Brandon makes it Instagram official with this great photo. Nice unicorns...

1st January 2018: Brandon says Sam is one of his favourite things from 2017 in this Instagram gallery, and it's all too much for us to deal with.

3rd January 2018: Sam tells V magazine: "I'm in a relationship right now and for the first time, I think I deserve to be happy."

He adds: "I'm actually asking myself if I'm going to be writing some happy love songs soon!"

30th January 2018: Sam and Brandon go to the Grammys together and seem to have the greatest night of their lives.

Getty Images

Getty Images

9th March 2018: Sam finally breaks his silence on THOSE kissing photos.

BACKGRID

Speaking on Radio 1, he said: “It was a joke - as a joke we were attacking each other.

“We were just waiting outside the shop while my sister got cigarettes. I was just joking.

“I was literally licking his eyeballs. It’s horrendous. I’m going to have to do something crazy to top it.'

He then compared Brandon, 24, to The Little Mermaid’s Ursula, saying: “He looks like Ursula sucking the voice out of Ariel. It’s so embarrassing.”

lol.

15th April 2018: Sam has been hanging out with Brandon's family. Serious much?!

17th April 2018: Sam and Brandon are on holiday together! Sam posts an adorable photo of the pair of them at Niagara Falls, and now all we want is to be at Niagara Falls too. Wah.

28th June 2018: Sam and Brandon reportedly split up after nine months together. The Sun reported that they just couldn't make it work with their busy schedules.

A source close to Sam said: "Sam and Brandon had a real whirlwind romance. They really fell for each other.



“But they are both so busy with their careers and unfortunately things just haven’t worked out.

“Sam is obviously devastated. This is the most significant relationship he has ever had.

Sam has now deleted all photos of him and Brandon from his Instagram. And Brandon has deleted nearly all of them except this one:
